snippet: The Chicago Bulls easily wiped out a 19-point halftime deficit in beating host Miami, 89-78, on Thursday night, dealing a huge blow to the Heat’s playoff hopes.
abstract: Chicago Bulls beat Miami Heat, 89-78; other basketball news noted.
